question: You recently bought a piece of computer equipment but it was broken. You work at home and you need this equipment for your work. Write a letter to the shop manager. In this letter:• describe the problem with the equipment• explain how this problem is affecting your work• say what you would like the shop to do
text: My name is Gurmit Singh. Last week, I bought a keyboard for my Dell computer from your shop. I am writing this letter to inform you that when I open that box unfortunately I found it damage as together as  when I tried to connect it to my computer it was not working.

I would like to tell you that I am a software Engineer hence, throughout the day I ought to spend the most time on the computer. As you know this equipment is a crucial part of the computer thus it is challenging for me to survive without a keyboard, as a result, I am unable to complete my task within the working time period.

I know you are a reputed firm of our city, therefore, I would like to recommend that please change this part as soon as possible so that I can continue my work with a delay of time. I will send it to you by tomorrow morning.
I hope you will take it seriously.
